Uses of Interface
edu.ccsu.designpatterns.pvz.GameEventObserver

Packages that use GameEventObserver
Package
Description
edu.ccsu.designpatterns.pvz
An example of the Observer patterns inspired by https://plantsvszombies.fandom.com/wiki/Plants_vs._Zombies_Heroes The set up is there are plants and zombies on the board the game is the subject and it can be observed for Attack, Bonus Attack, and Destroyed events.

  • Uses of GameEventObserver in edu.ccsu.designpatterns.pvz

    Classes in edu.ccsu.designpatterns.pvz that implement GameEventObserver
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ConsoleEventObserver
    This observer will monitor for the specified event type and when it occurs it will output that the event occured to the console.
    class 
    Mime
    This class demonstrates ways the Observer pattern can be used in different ways.
